name: Adobe Acrobat Plug-in
summary: Learn about .ACROPLUGIN files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Plugins are commonly created for batch publishing documents in a specific file or page layout format. Acrobat plug-ins can be created by third party developers.

description: Plug-in file used by Adobe Acrobat, a page layout and PDF publishing program; contains data that adds extra functionality to the software; used for expanding the capabilities of the application.
